description:
Yozen has infiltrated Kingo Island to remove its barrier. He was immediately caught in the spatial paopei of Chotenkun, one of the Juttenkun, but then a sinister aura surrounded him as he began to transform... Meanwhile, on Konron Mountain, Taikobo and the other still have faith that Yozen will remove the barrier, but they have less than four minutes left until Kingo Island`s main artillery fires on them. Can they reach Kingo Island in time to crash into it just as the barrier is removed?!
Source: crunchyroll
